description_expanded: MOSHU Women's Side Split Crewneck Sweatshirt is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for fashion. A fashionable crewneck sweatshirt for women with a side split hem and long sleeves. A cozy and stylish top for fall. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
